channel.title: Nirvana is recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Nirvana is recruiting" - The Immortal Realm Nirvana is recruiting.

item.title: Re: Nirvana is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Currently have nearly all upgrades including from Hitaiate Maker to Chaos Gate.

item.title: Re: Nirvana is recruiting
item.content:encoded:
We are looking more active people.
Our current upgrades include +100 stamina daily(includes +30 from burgerninja), epic monument, jonin council, war council, jonin academy, special jonin academy, chunin training school, genin training school, summoning circle, all buy able equipment, burgerninja, enticement altar, jutsu enhancement tower and lot more.

Come and see for yourself.

item.title: Nirvana is recruiting
item.content:encoded:
We are newly created immortal realm rising from the ashes of Nifelheim village.
We are looking for new villagers so we that we can get with your help to the top.
Getting more upgrades daily.

So come and join us!

Thank you for your time.
